name: Virginia Tech DESIGN WORKSHOP 2011
description:
Come and join us for an amazing 2-Day Industrial Design workshop seminar.  This event will 

The Ultimate Learning Experience

With over 8 intense classes taught by leading industry experts, Render Demo Workshop is the ultimate live learning experience.  From analogue hand sketching on paper to digital rendering using the Wacom Cintiq tablet in harmony with Autodesk's Sketchbook Pro, Adobe CS5 Illustrator and Photoshop.  Industry leaders from the Footwear, Product and Automotive design industries share their first-hand knowledge with you.

Space is limited to 50 seats so be sure to register soon!

Follow along with your laptop and sketching hardware (if you have it).

DATE:  September 10-11th, 2011
LOCATION:  The Hotel Roanoke and Conference Center Roanoke, VA 24016 â€Ž 

Breakfast and Lunch included!
